lead_paragraph: Taking advantage of a tax credit for buyers, the giant home builder reported a quarterly profit and a sharp increase in orders that topped analysts’ expectations.
snippet: Taking advantage of a tax credit for buyers, the giant home builder reported a quarterly profit and a sharp increase in orders that topped analysts’ expectations.

headline.main: Builder D.R. Horton Swings to a Profit
headline.seo: Surprisingly Strong Results for D.R. Horton
headline.print_headline: Builder D.R. Horton Swings to a Profit
